value.fullName: The continuity of family relationships and connections is preserved for youth
value.label: The continuity of family relationships and connections is preserved for youth

value.fullName: Families have enhanced capacity to provide for their youth's needs
value.label: Families have enhanced capacity to provide for their youth's needs

value.fullName: Youth are first and foremost protected from abuse and neglect
value.label: Youth are first and foremost protected from abuse and neglect

value.fullName: Youth physical and mental health needs are met
value.label: Youth physical and mental health needs are met

value.fullName: Youth have permanency and stability in their living situations
value.label: Youth have permanency and stability in their living situations

value.fullName: Youth are safely maintained in their homes whenever possible and appropriate
value.label: Youth are safely maintained in their homes whenever possible and appropriate
